website_summaries.verdict: The Vionic Alaina impressed purchasers with the comfort it offered. Its lightweight construction appealed to many people. It was said to relieve discomfort too. However, there were complaints that it did not fit properly and ran short. Critics also advised replacing the insole to get better arch support and cushioning. But in the end, buyers highly recommended it to their peers because it was comfortable to wear.
pros: A vast majority of owners described the Vionic Alaina as one of the most comfortable pair of walking shoes they have ever owned
Droves of consumers stated that this model offered adequate arch support
According to numerous users, the trainer was true to size and width
The lightweight nature of the product pleased plenty of people
More than a few reviewers commented that this footwear relieved pain caused by plantar fasciitis or previous injuries
cons: A minority of shoppers ranted that the elastic strap at the back pushed their feet forward which made the footgear feel short
A small number of wearers recommended replacing the insole in the Vionic Alaina to improve cushioning and arch support
it was too wide for some, while others claimed it was narrow
The collar was tight which needed to be broken in to make it easier to put on, said some testers
A few individuals complained that the upper material was stiff which rubbed their Achilles, instep, or toes

customer_reviews.title: regarding the Shoes
customer_reviews.text: THE SHOES ARE DEFECTIVE DO NOT BUY THIS STYLE. SELLER IS NOT RESPONDING BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on the heal part of the shoe doesn’t allow for it to stay in place. Constantly have to pull it up. Arch support is not what I thought. It’s somewhat leveled and not as much added comfort. The shoes themselves were uite uncomfortable for standing long periods/walking a lot. Walking around with the back sliding down, have to sit to adjust only for it to slide down again. Touching your shoes in a hospital position means washing your hands even more than usual. Also, the wide is much looser than I’m use to. For $120 I was expecting them to be flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Nala.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and comfy, but...
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but the shading on one shoe is darker than the other. (See photo) Will try to exchange but am very disappointed because I wanted them for a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have Vionic flip flops and house slippers, they're amazing! So I thought these shoes would be on the same level, but they're not. I just received them yesterday and put them on before going to work. I am sitting about 90% of the time at my job. With the little amount of walking I do, my feet were not comfortable. The support doesn't seem to be all be there and now that I'm home, I'm actually happy to have the shoes off. Very disappointed in these shoes... I guess that's why they're selling cheaper than the others. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Of My Eye

customer_reviews.title: Walking on Air in Style
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I get tons of compliments for these shoes when I wore them to work, a co-worker told me I looked like I was floating or bouncing instead of walking. Maybe these shoes have the wizarding magic of Harry Potter? I don't know. These are my second pair of Vionic and I hope they keep cranking out more shoes like this because I will need to work past retirement, or just not retire, and when you are over 50 with plantar faci-whatever it is you need shoes like this!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy South

customer_reviews.title: Sole Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I received the shoes an hour ago and put them on my feet to walk around the house to see if they were going to be comfortable and I felt something flopping on the bottom of the shoe and part of the soul was popping off. Should I return/exchange them as the feel great as far as the fit and support.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t see the hype
customer_reviews.text: I have a family member that raves about vionic shoes so I decided I would finally buy a pair. They don’t feel any different than any other pair of tennis shoes to me. My feet still hurt after walking a couple miles in them and they seem to run small. I’m usually a 6 or 6.5 in shoes so got the 6.5 to be safe and they are definitely cut small because I think a 7 would fit better. Still not sure what the hype is about this brand though. My arch/plantar fasciitis still hurts over a month after wearing
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Steep price, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These were my first Vionics and DANG were all the reviews about arch support right on. They are extremely supportive, easy and comfortable to walk in, and kind of cute. I actually really like the elastic tie instead of standard shoe laces, it's much more accessible and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best walking sneaker EVER !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I walk 3-5 miles a day and ADORE these sneakers!!! They were comfortable from day 1. No breaking in necessary. The orthotic support is PERFECT- not too much not too little. I’m a size 9 and I bought a size 9. They are perfect fit. I can’t say enough good things about these! Get them!!
customer_reviews.author: Neely Ciarcia

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive
customer_reviews.text: I have many other vionic shoes but these were the least supportive shoes from Vionic that I have ever tried. I wore them for a full day of running errands and by the end of the day my plantar fascitis was acting up horribly. I didn't have a problem with the back slipping down that others have mentioned which I was concerned about but they did not offer typical Vionic support. They didn't come in a Vionic box either, they came just wrapped in plastic which has not happened with other Vionic shoes I've purchased off of Amazon. Overall I would not recommend this shoe if you are needing support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent defective shoe
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed these shoes came with a broken string. The way it was wound around looks like someone sent the shoes in full knowledge they were defective. :( I did make sure to try them on to know if I ordered the right size and they fit well. I do like the arch support more in my Vionic slippers, but these feel they’ll be all right.
customer_reviews.author: RachelK

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable shoe but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and comfort of the shoes but I had to return them. This pair appeared to be defective. The left shoe had a very noticeable area on the top part where there was absolutely no pattern to it. One other thing to note is the fit. I had also bought another pair (black/white) in a size 9 since that's the size of my usual running type shoes, but they were a bit big and felt loose. I wear an 8.5 in walking shoes and that was the size of the Maroon colored pair that I returned.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have worn my shoes 3 times and barely did any walking in them and the tread is already worn down and bare. For the amount of money you spend on these shoes they ahod at least be able to uphold for a month..not just 3 days. I really needed pain relief from my plantar fascitis and I was completely let down.
customer_reviews.author: stile & Lisa Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on with good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I needed slip on shoes, because I broke my left hip and it may be a long time before I can put the left shoe on and tie its lace. As with my regular Brooks running shoes, I needed to get a 1/2 bigger than my shoe size. These shoes are more like sneakers than athletic shoes, but really fit the bill for me. They are cute, the arch support is good and hits the right spot, and they are elastic enough to accommodate the swelling in my left foot!.
customer_reviews.author: S. Laabs

customer_reviews.title: 4 months of comfort
customer_reviews.text: I stand on my feet almost 11 hours a day (which is better that sitting that long), but started to develop plantar fasciitis. I stand on a concrete floor with a laminate floor over it. I bought my first pair of Vionic shoes because that is what my boss wears. I loved them! I wear them with compression socks. My only issue with them is that they are only good for about 4 months. I paid $120 for my first pair, but decided to go with a less desirable color for $58. Is there a different version of this shoe that will last longer?
customer_reviews.author: NDF92

customer_reviews.title: No more heel spur/ plantar fasciitis pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering form heel spurs and plantar fasciitis for the past 3 years. I have been in agony I even had treatments (ultrasound ) on my feet. I decided to buy a pair of vionics and let me tell you it's the best brand when you're in agony. I got rid of all my shoes about17 pairs. I have been buying vionics sneakers, sandals, flip flops and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dushi

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am a fan of the Vionic shoe inserts. They have fantastic arch support and are very comfortable. With that being said, my expectations were high. Unfortunately these do not offer much in the way of arch support. The Vionic inserts are much nicer than these. Another issue I have is that the mouth of the shoe is very tight. If you like a little room to wiggle in the opening, these are not the shoes for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this in my true size 8..5. After receiving them, noticed my toes were jammed to the end of the shoe. I returned, got a quick turn around on my refund and reordered in a 9. They are perfect. Am an avid walker so these are perfect for any distance walking as well as just around the house. Would refer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe for me. I hope they make more colors.
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old, on my feet 8 hours a day, have plantars faciitis and have tried many many pairs of shoes including other vionics. These are by far the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn and I ordered another color, which I never do in the same shoe, and would like the black if I find it in my size.
customer_reviews.author: jnette

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are my current favorite sneakers. Very comfortable, and very cute. I get compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO COMFORTABLE I CAN WEAR THEM ALL DAY!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and always had trouble wearing sneakers. These sneakers are so comfortable I don't want to take them off! In fact I ordered 2 more pair in case they stop making them!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediatly
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe. Reviews stated they run 1/2 size small so I ordered 6.5W instead of 6W. These are supposed to be a wide size but they fit very snugly around toes. Otherwise fit is good. I put the shoes on and went to snug laces and immediately broke a lace loop. The orange loop ripped out of the stitching or glue on the (inside) side of the shoe. Very disappointed in the quality. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: EricTexas

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes. However, after wearing them twice the bottom of them starting coming loose in the front on one shoe. I don’t know if gluing it will work. Very disappointed. So, they sit in my closet until I can figure out how to fix them. Should have done a refund. But was too busy, till too late
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: Sure doesn’t fit like Vionic’s
customer_reviews.text: The shoe doesnt fit at all like other Vionic fit. Doesn’t feel like them either. Doesn’t have the support like all other Vionic’s I have bought in the past. Feels flat footed.
customer_reviews.author: Karol L Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good support shoe for my daily 2 mile walk with the pup. I suffer from bulging discs which flare up occasionally. This shows are very comfortable and seem to help align my back better than any other shoe I have tried. Will definitely be ordering more Vionic products.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 11 year old granddaughter who has foot pain especially playing sports, used these for basketball and no pain after basketball practice and that hasn’t happened in years. They’re walking shoes but she has successfully used them for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: 79Rose79

customer_reviews.title: Fixed Plantar Fascitis
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing hand-me-down shoes and gave myself a pretty bad case of plantar fascitis. I've tried various inserts and regular sneakers but these shoes, and a pair of Vionic slippers that I wear all the time in the house, have almost completely cured it. Pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: A Strong Poet

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love Vionic shoes! Started with the tide sandals a n.v d because of a foot issue tried the sneakers. My foot and knee issue are 100% better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Too tight but good arch
customer_reviews.text: They were great shoes for fit on my arch and comfortable in that aspect but they were very very tight on my foot and around my ankle. They definitely could not been worn with any sock. I planned to wear no shoe socks but that wasn’t possible. Sending them back. I do love Vionic shoes and have several pairs. Just not these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy on and off, breathable fabric with great support. I have lots of foot problems (plantar fasciitis, stress fracture, swelling) and these work all day long flexing with my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Lopshire

customer_reviews.title: Size/fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 10. They were too small and a 10 1/2 was not available so I tried a 10W. Also the too small. I ordered an 11. It should arrive tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Borta

customer_reviews.title: Supportive!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Recently developed bone spurs and got these shoes for walking around the house and yard and they are amazing after a day. I have high arches and narrow feet and these fit well. Also, generally a low back heel shoe doesn't work but these have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Haydens parents

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I normally love my Vionic shoes, but not this pair. They were pricy for the model. I was disappointed that I got blisters on the back of the heels/ankle, so I ended up not wearing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of tennis shoes that I could wear for more than a couple hours. I can comfortably wear these all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hearld

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed. Shoe did not feel sturdy or durable, and it was too small, pinched my toes. Have purchased from Vionic in the past and love my sandals. These were nowhere near the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Order FULL size up
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely order up a FULL size. Typically a 7.5 so I ordered an 8 after reading reviews. Still had to exchange for 8.5. Felt like my (short) toenails were shoved up against the structured toe of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E.

customer_reviews.title: Navy color runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and fit of this shoe, however the navy color I purchased ran about 1/2 size too small. Said a size 7 (EUR 38). Maybe other colors run true to size, but not this one, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: moi

customer_reviews.title: Less foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for work as a nurse, heads up it is a mesh shoe so shoe covers may be needed or the hidden pair of Danskos when surveyors are around, but my plantar fasciitis pain and bunionette pain as significantly imrpoved over the 1 month of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best walking shoe I have ever bought. Did read reviews and bought 1/2 size larger than my size 9 foot. I did and it fit perfectly and is so so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Vionic is an amazing shoe product and they do wonders for my feet. However the quality seems to be hit and miss. This style of shoe was a good 1 1/2 sizes too small. The upper material is light and breathable but doesn’t provide the support I was hoping for. My favorites of all their shows are the sandals and hiking boots. I wore the boots on the Inca Trail to Macchu and don’t think my feet would have lasted without Vionic’s support.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Morris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair so I knew I loved them just wanted a different color. So comfortable. Can wear all day and be on my feet as well. Still feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ran large
customer_reviews.text: I am returning these because they were too big and rubbed a weird spot on the bottom of my foot. Seem like good shoes if they fit properly. I gave them three stars only as it relates to this particular seller because they are charging me $5 to return them.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer snyder

customer_reviews.title: problem with insole
customer_reviews.text: the insole has a slightly sharp ridge running around the insole. This is painful. and causes a blister. I may try wearing with socks or remove insole and replace with Dr. Scholl's. Or I may have to return. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Mary Billman

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Cute but vionic does not use same sizing thruout their shoes as hoped. Been a 10 for 4 years. These 10’s too small; other 9.5’s too big.
customer_reviews.author: MargJY

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, support, and style.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are cute, comfortable, and most important provide needed support. No more achey feet! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for planter fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: These shoes take away the plantar fasciitis pain!! I'd sleep in them if I could. I live them. Perfect fit and I get a lot of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: gidget

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Favorite shoe/ sneaker wear them with everything! So comfy right out of box wore them to Europe. Walked and walked they are grest!
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: Sole is hard as cement
customer_reviews.text: Hated this shoe. The inner sole was so hard, no cushion support, and was like walking on cement or a hard marble floor. I have many Vionic shoes, and even slippers, which I love. But these were a huge disappointment. If you are looking for comfortable sneakers, do not pick these!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: no endurance. wire maybe 20 times (and NOT forking walks) and they have already lost their shape and support they ere great for first week.... no more expected more for high pricr
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Vionic tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supporting, I'm wearing them for work retail-my personal opinion they are a bit high priced
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. Wore them to walk all over Italy and they were very comfortable. My plantar fasciitis stays in check with vionic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great Arch Support Walking Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: As usual great arch support. Perfect for walking. Eliminates hip pain
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Cute style and very comfortable. The design is a lot better than many of the bionic sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: 1stgradeteach

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.text: Pure comfort right out of the box. Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: M.B. Rusk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort and support. My sore feet are much happier with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Holly

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money-
customer_reviews.text: The heel on this shoe does not stay up at all :( I constantly have to pull them up or the shoe falls off. They are super cute, but for the price of the shoe, having it not stay on isn't worth it. Sadly I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: TBurns

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but not as supportive as I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are comfy, but not as supportive as I was expecting/hoping. I was looking for something to use for walking, but I will use these for work and general use.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: These fit a little snug. Nice shoe though.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, it was too tight though. I could reorder in a bigger size, but I’m not sure if I am going to or not.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up
customer_reviews.text: They are nice shoes but seem to run small .
customer_reviews.author: sumnurse

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches so need a strong arch support. I wore these on vaca where we averaged walking 7 miles each day and didn’t have any problems with foot pain. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: ddh

customer_reviews.title: can't get my foot in
customer_reviews.text: shoes were nice but I could not get my foot in the opening
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair Great for anyone with history or active plantar fasciitis. Very confortable
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Bye custom orthotics!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. As a long time wearer of custom orthotics , I can say I don't need them anymore with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: K Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Brand is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneakers they fit perfectly and Vionic has me for LIFE
customer_reviews.author: Caren Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have these shoes in another color. Same size and width. This was very tight and not true to size and description. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: christine P

customer_reviews.title: An amazing shoe and brand
customer_reviews.text: I had foot surgery on my heel. After recovering. I needed a comfortable shoe. And this one delivered
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda O.

customer_reviews.title: Supportive on the back, and easy on the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love vionics! I will never go back to another work shoe! I am on my feet ALL day, and have FLAT feet, and these guys keep my knees and back from feeling exhausted every day! These are not as supportive as my Mary Janes, but they are so much cuter! Can’t wait to get another color!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. They fit well and feel great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe but order one size up
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe but i ordered my normal size and it was too small! This shoe runs small! I reordered a full size up!
customer_reviews.author: KimS Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Too short, order up half a size at least.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfy, but very short. Would add a star or two if they were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: afekshun

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: They were a little looser than I Would have liked but overall love them I’ve done so much better not as much pain from the planters foot since I got these so thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fell apart after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a light weight athletic shoe to wear walking around the U.S. Open. Unfortunately, after I wore the sneakers for the 4th time the bottom of the shoe ripped and started dragging. I am disappointed with this product as I have many Vionic brand shoes that have not fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: James M McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Vionics are the best shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Vionic shoes! They are so comfortable and keep my feet from hurting. I love the arch and the fit. These are slip-ons which I like, but sometimes a little difficult to put on. I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Downs

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! So comfy! And they help the pain with my knees and feet!
customer_reviews.author: KARLA CORTEZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice for arch issues
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable but have a soft heel. My foot slides forward and makes them a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Light as a feather and great arch support. I can wear them all day and my feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Adabklyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Very comfortable. I usually wear 8, 8 1/2 in athletic shoes. I returned the 8 1/2 for a 9 and it fits great. I have a medium to narrow foot but felt too snug in smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Mei-lan Fredlund

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers to walk in. My feet do not hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love vionics, these just too small
customer_reviews.text: I love vionics and these are too cute. Unfortunately, I am finding them to be too small. I own other pairs of vionic shoes that are all the same size, these just run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: aboxfull

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! I have horrible plantar fasciitis and these shoes have helped tremendously! I wear them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers I’ve had in years. It took a few days to get used to the really great arch support. I’ve ordered another pair - leather this time!
customer_reviews.author: Rupali

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe going!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I have the black & white too. Great support for my new knee.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute & stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Bought these for work as I have several foot issues & these are worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfort, but mostly like the ease of putting on and taking off—no shoestrings.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great!..work as a nurse and need support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L

customer_reviews.title: Not wide
customer_reviews.text: I have the exact shoe except not in the wide size. I ordered the wide to be more comfortable and it was not!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. It is supportive and stays on my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Arch in heel of shoe didn't fit right!
customer_reviews.text: The arch in the shoe seemed to be a little long for the shoe. The back of heel kept mashing down when on feet. Just didn't fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Peeples

customer_reviews.title: Ok, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture. The heel does not stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Polak

customer_reviews.title: Feels good all day!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe feels good all day from going to the gym, to errands to up and down at home!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria 503

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Slip on athletic shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have planter fascists and bone spurs. This is my 3rd Vionic purchase and I absolutely love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just one thing
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have enough arch support. I used an addition one.
customer_reviews.author: huck

customer_reviews.title: Top cloth  too tight for hammertoe
customer_reviews.text: The cloth across the top of the toes seems comfortable at first but scrapes at one of my hammertoes.
customer_reviews.author: jeklina

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support
customer_reviews.text: No breaking in period. I wore these right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tea drinker

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I just need to get a 1/2 size larger....a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Green

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. The back is collapsible because it looks like they were intended to wear as regular slip-ons or as slip-on mules. The soft back works for me as a regular slip-on shoe because Vionics whole shoe is an orthotic & they keep my foot stable. I've been wearing them as mules in the house & they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I will never bother trying another shoe again. I found the shoe made for my feet. Thank you, Vionic! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ramble Trickery

product_meta.title: Vionic Women's Trainer Alaina
product_meta.description:
The sport lifestyle style continues to blaze red-hot.

 * Upper: Lightweight, flexible textile/PU.
 * Footbed: Removable textile.
 * Outsole: Durable rubber for buoyant movement.

This style runs slightly small – we recommend ordering a half size up!

For the greatest comfort, we recommend wearing your new VIONIC footwear for just a few hours for the first few days to allow your feet to adjust to the new level of orthotic comfort and support.
Within one to two weeks you should find the product completely comfortable and supportive.

To clean, wipe with damp cloth and air dry under indirect sunlight only.
Do NOT submerge in water or use solvents to clean products.
feature_bullets: Pull-on sock upper with toggled elastic lacing
Removable, podiatrist designed orthotic insole with added arch support
Lightweight outsole with targeted traction points
